title: Koibito Daikō no Baito o Hajimeta ore, Nazedarou… Fukusū no Bishōjo Kara Shimei Irai ga Haitte Kuru (WN) - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Appearance Changes   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   College/University   Doting Older Siblings   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   M*sturbation   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Part-Time Job   Poor Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   R-15   Secret Identity   Senpai-Kouhai Relationship   Shy Characters   Siblings   Younger Love Interests
author: Natsuno Minoru   Noushuku Kangen Budou-chan   夏乃実   濃縮還元ぶどうちゃん
description:
Shiba Ryuuma was in trouble with school fees. So, he wanted to find a job that could earn money in a short time… Then he was introduced to a part-time job by his friend. That part-time job was called lover agency service.

He thought that he couldn’t resolve his problem without making some sacrifices. So he applied for the job…, one day suddenly there was a request.

But, it was strange. She was someone that people think that it wasn’t strange for her to have a boyfriend.

Finally, he who never dated anyone chose to accept the request.>
